channel.title: Mac on My First Step
channel.description: Recent content in Mac on My First Step

item.title: AWS CDK(v2): Basic Settings
item.description: AWS CDK v2 is a tool that enables you to create and modify AWS infrastructure configurations by writing them in a programming language. At first, it was a snap to do from the web admin console, but as it becomes more and more difficult to do the same thing over and over again (quickly and without mistakes and without getting frustrated), this kind of standardized system is useful once you get used to it.
